title: Counterstrike: Global Offensive
rules: Any form of script is prohibited and using console is forbidden (except to record).
Silent planting and planting bombs so that they cannot be defused is illegal.
Winning team must report result and round score to the admin.
If a team is not ready at the game start deadline, that team will forfeit one round for each two minutes delayed.  The match will be forfeit at thirty (30) minutes.
All delays must be reported and delay penalties must be approved by an admin.
All teams must notify the admin of attendance.  Team leaders are responsible of making sure his team is in the bracket at the start of the tournament.
All team members must have registered and paid before joining the tournament.
Freeagent teams will be formed before the tournament start.

tourney.title: 5v5
rules: 5v5: Single Elimination, one match.  Finals are BO3.
15 rounds as Terrorists and 15 rounds as Counter-Terrorists per team.
The first team that scores 16 rounds wins and the match ends immediately.
Team A will be the winner of a coin toss. The match is played on the map which is selected by Team A at step 4 of this procedure. The sides are chosen via a knife round.

Team A is the winner of a coin toss. The first match will start on the map which has been chosen by Team A at step 3 of this procedure. The sides will be chosen via a knife round. The last map will only be played if both teams win one map during the match. For the overtime teams do not switch sides at the end of a match.
